content: दंतुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दंत-उरच्] {@--1@} Having long or projecting teeth; शूकरे निहते चैव दंतुरो जायते नरः <ls>Tv.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 54.</ls> {@--2@} Jagged, dentated, notched, serrated, uneven (<ab>fig.</ab> also); अखर्वगर्वस्मितदंतुरेण <ls>Vikr. 1. 50.</ls> {@--3@} Undulatory. {@--4@} Rising, bristling (as hair). {@--5@} Overspread, covered with; <ls>U. 6. 27.</ls>
